articles.title: Sensex Today | Share Market Live Updates: Sensex up 125 points; Nifty around 21,650; auto stocks surge | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Sensex Today | Share Market Live Updates: Sensex and Nifty opened higher on Thursday as Asian markets rallied to new highs tracking Wall Street. IT stocks are in focus ahead of earnings announcement by TCS and Infosys later today
articles.content: Sensex Today | Share Market Live Updates: Indian benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty were higher on Thursday as Asian markets rallied to new peaks. IT stocks are in focus ahead of earnings announcemen… [+11449 chars]
